title: OK Job Growth Isn't OK
text:
Friday's U.S. employment report for August was poor, and perhaps worse than the consensus realizesIf employment is weakening, it would be a very ominous sign that a recession is getting closerThis report has a lot of early signs of just thatEmployment report might look OK... On the surface, the August non-farm payrolls report might seem not so bad...

description: If employment is weakening, it would be a very ominous sign that a recession is getting closer.
authors: It Would Be A Very Ominous Sign That A Recession Is Getting Closer.
